summary: The history of the comic book superhero, Superman in his various media incarnations.
cast: Kevin Spacey|Gerard Jones|Forrest J. Ackerman|Elliot S. Maggin|Mark Hamill|Mark Waid|Gene Simmons|Stan Lee|Stephen Fishler|Chuck McCann|Philip Hecht|Gail Simone|Paul Levitz|Noel Neill|Gary Grossman|Jack Larson|Bill Mumy|Whitney Ellsworth|Denny O'Neil|Annette O'Toole|Adam West|Norman Twain|Lesley Ann Warren|Bryan Singer|Ilya Salkind|Alexander Salkind|Richard Donner|Tom Mankiewicz|Marlon Brando|Christopher Reeve|Barbara Johnson|Anne Archer|Stockard Channing|Deborah Raffin|Margot Kidder|Jackie Cooper|Mike Carlin|Gerard Christopher|Art Thibert|Dean Cain|Alfred Gough|Miles Millar|Dan DiDio|Jerry Seinfeld|Jon Peters|Michael Dougherty|Dan Harris|Thomas Tull|Brandon Routh|Kate Bosworth|Sam Huntington|Chris Lee|Gilbert Adler|Stephan Bender|George Reeves
title: La increíble historia de Superman: ¡Mira al cielo!
